channel.title: Deep Learning on Niall Martin
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Niall Martin

item.title: How to Start Learning Deep Learning
item.description: The Basics Due to the recent achievements of artificial neural networks across many different tasks (such as face recognition, object detection and Go), deep learning has become extremely popular. This post aims to be a starting point for those interested in learning more about it. If you already have a basic understanding of linear algebra, calculus, probability and programming: I recommend starting with Stanford’s CS231n. The course notes are comprehensive and written well.
